sentences.sContent: My grandmother and aunt will be there in my parents' stead.
sentences.sCn: 我的祖母和姑妈将代替我的父母出席。

sentences.sContent: These two games here will stand them in good stead for the future.
sentences.sCn: 这里的两场比赛对他们的将来很有用。

trans.tranOther: If you do something in someone's stead, you replace them and do it instead of them.
